org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.impl.ldap

Class ExternalLdapConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.impl.ldap.ExternalLdapConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionConfig

    public class ExternalLdapConfig
extends Object
implements ConnectionConfig
    Models the external configuration of the LDAP data store. This model is used by the ConnectionConfigFactory to establish a connection to the persistence layer.
    See Also:
    ConnectionConfigFactory

        public int getLdapHeartbeat()
        Description copied from interface: ConnectionConfig

      • parseNumber

        protected Integer parseNumber(String number,
                              Integer emptyValue,
                              Integer invalidValue)
        Convenience parsing method which handles the unassigned condition.
        Parameters:
        number - The String containing the number.
        emptyValue - The value to return if the String is empty.
        invalidValue - The value to return if the String cannot be parsed to a number.
        Returns:
        The parsed number, or emptyValue if the String is empty, or invalidValue if it cannot be parsed.
